<answer>Based on common car rental companies in Los Angeles, some popular ones include Enterprise, Hertz, and Avis. Many of these companies offer electric or hybrid vehicles as part of their fleet.

Some well-known companies with electric options in Los Angeles include:
- Enterprise: Offers a variety of vehicles, including some electric and hybrid models.
- Hertz: Known to have Tesla models available in their fleet.
- Avis: Also offers electric and hybrid vehicles.
